Source.Name: backintime-kde
Source.Summary: KDE4 Masaüstü için basit yedekleme sistemi

Package.Name: backintime-common
Package.Description: backintime-common, contains non GUI files used by different GUI fontends. Back In Time is a simple backup tool for Linux inspired from “flyback project” and “TimeVault”. The backup is done by taking snapshots of a specified set of directories.
